snippet: Polesitter Marc Marquez extended his perfect start to the MotoGP season by storming to victory at the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday to cap another dominating week in Texas....

headline.print_headline: Marquez Wins in Texas to Extend Perfect Start
headline.main: Marquez Wins in Texas to Extend Perfect Start

lead_paragraph: Polesitter Marc Marquez extended his perfect start to the MotoGP season by storming to victory at the Grand Prix of the Americas on Sunday to cap another dominating week in Texas.
